channel.title: upcoming on WWNeuRise
channel.description: Recent content in upcoming on WWNeuRise

item.title: Inter-Areal Communication
item.description:
The schedule for our second block is out! We will update it with the talks title and the abstracts.

As with our first block, talks will be streamed on Crowdcast

10th of March 2021, 5pm CET

Aleena Garner: “A Cortical Circuit for Audio-Visual Predictions” - Keller lab, Friedrich Miescher Institute

Kelly Clancy: “Understanding sensorimotor control at global and local scales” - Mrsic-Flogel lab, Sainsbury Wellcome Centre.

24th of March 2021, 5pm CET

Matthew Perich: " Inferring brain-wide interactions using data-constrained recurrent neural network models" - Rajan lab, Mount Sinai

Evren Gokcen title TBA - Yu lab, Carnegie Mellon University

7th of April 2021, 5pm CET

Monique Smith title TBA - Malenka lab, Stanford University

Adi Kol title TBA - Goshen lab, Edmond & Lily Safra Center

21st of April 2021, 5pm CET

David Tingley title TBA - Buzsaki lab, NYU

Javad Karimi Abadchi title TBA - McNaughton lab, University of Lethbridge

item.title: Neuroscience of Naturalistic behavior
item.description: We’re accepting applications to give a talk! Fill out this form if you are interested, or don’t hesitate to get in touch with us if you have any questions.
